# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)
- Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)

### Iron plate factory at position (40.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0))
- Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0))
- Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0))
- Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0))

### Lab at position (2.5, 0.5)
Consists of lab (position (2.5, 0.5)) and burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5))

### Storage at position (43.5, -82.5)
Consists of chest (position (43.5, -82.5))
- Chest (position (40.5, -80.5))
- Chest (position (43.5, -81.5))
- Chest (position (2.5, 0.5))
- Chest (position (0.5, 2.5))

### Water supply at position (-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5)) and pipe group (fluid system 105038)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill
- Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel before starting the mining process
- Make sure the burner mining drill is placed near the resource to be mined

### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt
- Make sure the furnace has fuel before starting the smelting process

### Errors when using boiler
- Ensure the boiler has fuel before starting the steam generation process
- Make sure the boiler is connected to a steam engine

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure the offshore pump is placed near a water source
- Make sure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe group

### Errors when using lab
- Ensure the lab has power before starting the research process
- Make sure the lab has the required ingredients to research

### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure the burner inserter has fuel before starting the insertion process
- Make sure the burner inserter is placed near a chest or other container

### Errors when using pipe group
- Ensure the pipe group is connected to a fluid source (e.g. offshore pump or boiler)
- Make sure the pipe group is connected to a fluid destination (e.g. steam engine or furnace)
